an3.67:1.8: evaṃ hoti etarahi paccuppannamaddhānan’ti → evaṃ etarahi paccuppannanti (bj, pts1, mr) | evaṃ hoti etarahi paccuppannanti (s1-3, km)
an3.67:2.2: ṭhapanīyaṃ pañhaṃ na ṭhapeti → thapanīyaṃ pañhaṃ na thapeti (mr)
an3.67:3.2: aññātavāde → aññavāde (bj, s1-3, km, pts1) | aññātavāre (mr)
an3.67:8.4: tadariyo kathanācare → tadariyo na kathaṃ vade (mr)
